titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation against the false dying of silke
Proclamations. 1630-08-09
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles, I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Farnham, the ninth day of August, in the sixth yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 24; Steele notation: Realme, into 2) some 3) there- shall.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
